---
title: "Div.2 #473 C"
problem: http://codeforces.com/contest/959/problem/C
---
Mahmoud のアルゴリズムが誤った答えを返す例は以下のような木である.

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" width="151px" height="191px" version="1.1" content="&lt;mxfile userAgent=&quot;Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/65.0.3325.181 Safari/537.36&quot; version=&quot;8.5.6&quot; editor=&quot;www.draw.io&quot; type=&quot;device&quot;&gt;&lt;diagram id=&quot;6de42b81-6db9-91b4-ba07-bb612db72109&quot; name=&quot;Page-1&quot;&gt;&lt;/diagram&gt;&lt;/mxfile&gt;" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><defs/><g transform="translate(0.5,0.5)"><ellipse cx="15" cy="15" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="55" cy="95" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="15" cy="95" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="95" cy="95" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="15" cy="175" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="55" cy="175" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="95" cy="175" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><ellipse cx="135" cy="175" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#000000" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 15 80 L 15 30" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 48.29 81.58 L 21.71 28.42" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 84.39 84.39 L 25.61 25.61" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 48.29 161.58 L 21.71 108.42" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 15 160 L 15 110" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 84.39 164.39 L 25.61 105.61" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/><path d="M 122.5 166.71 L 27.48 103.32" fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="3" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="none"/></g></svg>

この木は2頂点ですべての辺をカバーできるが, 深さが奇数の頂点が3つある. このような木を作るためには, 頂点数が6以上でないといけない. 頂点数が6以上であれば深さ2の木をどんどん増やしていけばいい.

頂点数が5以下ではどのような木でも Mahmoud のアルゴリズムが正しい答えを返してしまうので `-1` を出力する.

なお, Mahmoud のアルゴリズムが正しい答えを返す例は一直線の木である.
